string.text: Cost of repairing your sidearm:
Cost of repairing primary weapon:
Cost of repairing your armour:
Well, is my weapon ready?
Weapon? What weapon?\nAaahh... That weapon... I thought you had forgotten about it ... my mistake... Ha-ha... just kidding. Here, take it ... it's as good as new.
Sidorovich, do you repair weapons?

You're asking about that weapon in the vice out back? Yes, its a nice weapon. However, it needs new parts. So, what do you want to repair? I warn you though ... its not cheap work. The more damage, the more expensive it will be. Besides, for repair I need a similar weapon for spare parts. Check your PDA. There is a weapons compatibility chart listed there. And look here ... do not give me a unique weapon for spare parts - I will keep it, and you will never see it again. Also, you should consider the time it takes to repair things. The more complex the repair, the more time it will take. Sometimes half a day ... perhaps longer. And just so you know, I do not do repairs on body armour. You will need to find someone else to do that, or you can buy a special repair-kit, and do it yourself ... if you have the skill, that is ...
Repair my sidearm:
Repair my primary weapon:
Repair my Armour:
Nothing for now, I will return later ... possibly then.
When the repair is finished - I will inform you via your PDA. It's not a lot of work, about half an hour's work or so ...
When the repair is finished - I will inform you via your PDA. It's a bit of damage. About an hour's work or so ...
When the repair is complete - I will inform you via your PDA. There's quite a bit of damage .... it's going to take at least an hour and a half ...
When I've finished the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. There is some serious damage done here - about 3 hours work ... don't bother to wait.
When I've finished the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. There is some serious damage done here - I have to replace the firing mechanism - about 4 hours work ... don't bother to wait.
When the repair is finished - I will inform you via your PDA. It will take about 6 hours or so ... use another weapon for now.
Yes, Marked One, all the repairs are complete ...\n \nUse it well.
What kind of business are you running here anyways!? - I give you two weapons to have one fixed, and then you tell me to wait... I don't think so ...
Masterful work. You know your small arms well ...
Can you repair something else for me?
Stop wasting my time, come back when you have something that has actually been damaged.
That's fine, thank you. I've been ripped-off, but at least the weapon has been repaired.
Well its better than nothing at all ... Here, take it.
Here, take the money... What?! not enough? This is more than State employees receive in a month!!! Take it now ... before I change my mind.
I'll take whatever I can get. Still ... it's a rip-off though!!
OK .. give me the money. Here in these parts, Traders make huge profits from the work of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s ... lol!!
I received your message ... is the repair job finished?
Yes ... get it out of my sight. I've wasted a ton of spare parts on this thing ... it was hardly even worth it ..
Vasily, can you repair my equipment!?

I certainly can ... I warn you though ... its not cheap work. The more damage, the more expensive it will be. Besides, for repair I need a similar weapon for spare parts. It's a necessary to requirment. Check your PDA. There is a weapons compatibility chart listed there. And look here ... do not give me a unique weapon for spare parts - I will keep it, and you will never see it again. Also, you should consider the time it takes to repair things. The more complex the repair, the more time it will take. Sometimes half a day ... perhaps longer. - the majority of the work is replacing damaged parts .. So?! ...
Repair my sidearm:
Repair my primary weapon:
Repair my body armour:
That's too expensive for now... I will have to come back later.
When I finish the repairs - I will send you a message. Its not a lot of work ... in about half an hour it will be ready for you ...
When I finish the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. I think about an hour should suffice ...
When the repair is complete - I will inform you via your PDA. There's quite a bit of damage .... it's going to take at least an hour and a half ...
When I've finished the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. There is some serious damage done here - about 3 hours work ... don't bother to wait.
When I've finished the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. There is some serious damage done here - I have to replace the firing mechanism - about 4 hours work ... don't bother to wait.

When I finish the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. This weapon here is almost ruined... It will take about 6 hours, get some sleep or have a drink ... this repair will take some serious work ...
I will send you a message when its done. Its not damaged too badly. It will take about an hour or two ...
When I finish the repairs I will send you a message. Quite a bit of damage here, about 4 hours work, I'd say ...
What is this garbage?!! ... if you really insist on getting it repaired, it's going to take at least 8 hours. I'll send you a message via your PDA when it's done.
When the repair is finished I will contact you. This is going to take some time to sort out ... I hope you have enough cash to pay for it!! It's going to take around 12 hours repair time.
Are you fucking serious!!? .. this thing belongs in the garbage!! ... well, if you insist, I will repair it for you ... I will send you a message when it's done ... this is going to take me all day.
When I finish the repairs - I will send you a message. What the hell happened to this armour!? It's going to take days to find the right parts for this ...
Vasily, you crook: I gave you 2 weapons, and a lot of cash ... and, yet I still have to wait?! ...
Vasily, These repairs are important ... take all the time you need.
Nice job!! .. Did you work at a small-arms factory before all this?
Can you repair something else for me?
Well then, give it back ... I will make do.
Its a deal .. thank you ... Here's your cash.
Just like new... thank you ... Here, take the money.
Here, take it before I change my mind ...
I'll take whatever I can get for this sidearm ...
It's a deal. Here, us Shopkeepers make a huge profit from you people ...
I received your message. Is the repair work finished?
It's all ready for you. Here, take it away ...
Hello, Master Weaponsmith, can you fix something for me?

I certainly can ... I warn you though ... its not cheap work. The more damage, the more expensive it will be. Besides, for repair I need a similar weapon for spare parts. It's a necessary to requirment. Check your PDA. There is a weapons compatibility chart listed there. And look here ... do not give me a unique weapon for spare parts - I will keep it, and you will never see it again. Also, you should consider the time it takes to repair things. The more complex the repair, the more time it will take. Sometimes half a day ... perhaps longer. - the majority of the work is replacing damaged parts .. So?! ...
Repair my sidearm:
Repair my primary weapon:
Repair my Armour:
Ok ... I will return later.
When I finish the repairs - I will send you a message. Its not a lot of work ... in about half an hour it will be ready for you ... Have a drink at the bar.
When I finish the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. I think about an hour should suffice ...
When the repair is complete - I will inform you via your PDA. There's quite a bit of damage .... it's going to take at least an hour and a half ...
When I've finished the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA. There is some serious damage done here - about 3 hours work ... don't bother to wait.
When I finish the repair I will inform you via your PDA. Many parts to change here ... At least 4 hours work. It would be cheaper to simply buy a new weapon. But, nevertheless ...
When I finish the repair I will inform you via your PDA. This is badly damaged, but I can fix it. It will take around 6 hours ...
When I finish the repair I will inform you via your PDA. It's a small job. Simply needs a few small adjustments. An hour and a half, maybe a bit longer.
When I finish the repair I will inform you via your PDA. Not too much damage, but I need to re-check and tweak all of the non-standard additions. Come back in about 5 hours ...
When I finish the repair I will inform you via your PDA. This will take about five and a half hours ...
What pile of Burer shit did you find this in!? This will take at least seven hours to repair!!! I will inform you via your PDA when it's finished, so do not switch it off ...
This is a piece of junk. I hope you brought another weapon for spare parts? This will take about eight hours. When I finish the repair I will inform you via your PDA.
When I finish the repair I will inform you via your PDA. This is going to take a while, and its going to cost you some serious money ... 10 hours work, perhaps more ...
When I finish - I will send you a message:\nThis is not much work - two hours.
When I finish - I will contact you:\nNot too much damage - four hours.
When I finish - I will send you a message:\nThis is a serious repair - eight hours.
When I finish - I will contact you:\nThis is a big job - twelve hours.
When I finish - I will send you a message:\nLooks like I won't be getting much sleep tonight ...
When I finish - I will send you a message:\nYou seriously want this fixed? This will take days! Oh well ... it's your money ...
Pay up front, and supply my own parts ... and then I still have to wait!!!
Sometimes waiting is necessary, I must make all of the necessary repairs.
Masterful work. Your the best damn Weaponsmith in the ZONE!!!
Can you repair something else for me?
Well, let us see ... what needs fixing?
It will be fine ... thanks ... now that you have all my money anyways ...
Well, it's better than nothing ... Here, take it.
Here, take it before I change my mind ...
Give me the money ... stop complaining ...
I will take your money ... no problem. Here in the ZONE, Traders profit from people such as yourself ...
Hello Master Technician, do you provide upgrades for various weapons?

Yes, I can perform upgrades for certain weapons, but I warn you ... it's not cheap. Im the only Tech in the ZONE that can do this kind of work ... so don't complain about the price!! I don't, however, work on pistols - check your PDA ... I have uploaded a list of available upgrades. Also ... all upgrades take about 3 hours. Any weapons to be modified that also require repairs will cost more, and it will be necessary to wait even longer for the work to be completed.
Let's proceed to upgrade.
Upgrade my sidearm:
What type of upgrade would you like?
Change the calibre of the weapon to an ammunition type which is more commonly available ...
Tighten up the weapons grouping ... a mere miss of a few centimetres could cost me my life out here.
Reduce the weight of the weapon - it will be easier to carry, and make for a steadier aim.
Don't do anything yet ...
Upgrade my primary weapon:
What type of upgrade would you like me to perform?
Change the calibre of the weapon to an ammunition type which is more commonly available ...
Tighten up the weapons grouping ... a mere miss of a few centimetres could cost me my life out here.
Reduce the weight of the weapon - it will be easier to carry, Im not Shwarzenegger ... lol!!
Don't do anything just yet ...
I will come back later ...
When the upgrade is complete, I will send you a message.\nIt will take at least 3 hours.
You want me to wait?! ... even after I've paid you that much!?
Masterful work. Are you the best Weaponsmith in the ZONE?
Can you upgrade something else for me?
Well hand it over .... I'll see what I can do ...
it's fine, thank you ... if I have any problems with it, I will come again.
It's better than nothing ... Here take it.
Here ... What, not enough?! Take it before I change my mind!!
Hello there ... how is my repair coming along?
The work is done. Here, take it away...
Do you perform repairs?

I certainly can ... I warn you though ... its not cheap work. The more damage, the more expensive it will be. Besides, for repair I need a similar weapon for spare parts. It's a necessary to requirment. Check your PDA. There is a weapons compatibility chart listed there. And look here ... do not give me a unique weapon for spare parts - I will keep it, and you will never see it again. Also, you should consider the time it takes to repair things. The more complex the repair, the more time it will take. Sometimes half a day ... perhaps longer. - the majority of the work is replacing damaged parts ... With armour, it's much easier work, as I have all of the necessary materials in stock already ... So?
Repair my sidearm:
Repair my primary weapon:
Repair my armour:
Too expensive for now... I Will come back later ...
I Will repair it for you - I will contact you via your PDA when the work is done.\nIt should take about half an hour.
When I've finished the repair - I will inform you via your PDA.\nIt doesn't look all that bad.\nThis will take about an hour or so.
When I have finished the repairs- I will send you a message via your PDA\nAn hour and a half at least ...
When I finish the repair - I will inform you via your PDA.\nDid you drop this weapon in an anomaly or something?... This will take about 3 hours.
When I finish the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA.\nWhat's that smell!? Did you drop this in some Snork shit?! At least 4 hours of work, and a good cleaning ...
When I've finished the repairs - I will inform you via your PDA.\nThis weapon is almost ruined ... At least 6 hours worth of repair time for this one.
When I finish the repairs- I will send you a message when it's done ... or you can wait.\nThis is not going to be much work. It should be ready in a couple of hours time.
When I finish the repairs- I will send you a message when it's ready.\nI will be able to fix this in 4 hours time ...
When I've finished the repairs- I will contact you via your PDA.\nThere is some serious work to be done here ... about 8 hours work ...
When I've finished the repairs- I will contact you via your PDA.\nDid you find this in a Chimera's den!? This will take at least twelve hours!!
When I finish the repairs - I will send you a message.\nYou can't be serious ... this is a joke right?! This is going to take about 18 hours ... at least.
When I've finished the repairs- I will send you a message.\nThis is the worst one you have brought to me yet!! .. This will take days!!!
Sjak, Im going to start calling you the 'Miser' of the Zone. I give you two weapons, pay the cash up front ... and then I also have to wait for it ... A first class Fleecer, you!!
Sjak, do what it is necessary, I can wait ...
Thanks.
Can you repair something else?
Well, lets see what else needs some work ... I hope you didn't lose your wallet.
I will come back later ... see you.
Well, it's better than nothing, I suppose.
What?! that's not nearly enough for this piece of scrap metal!!
I will take the cash for the first weapon. I see trying to bargain with you is quite pointless ...
I will take cash for the second weapon. Here in the Zone, us Shopkeepers make a good profit from folks such as you ... HaHa!!
Can you repair weapons?

I can repair almost anything, and my colleague offers PDA upgrades.
 So, what will it be?
 
List of possible repairs:
Repair my sidearm:
Repair my primary weapon:
Repair my armour:
I dont have enough money ... another time perhaps?
Here, all is fixed and greased as was necessary!!
Here. All the necessary repairs were made.
You are indeed the Master of repairs. Thank you.
Indeed. excellent work!!
Can you repair something else for me?
Certainly. I'm always looking for some work.\n \nList of possible repairs:
Do you do repair work?
I will take a look. I have all of the necessary equipment.\n \nList of possible repairs:
Repair my sidearm:
Repair my primary weapon:
Repair my armour:
I dont have enough money. I will come back later.
This will take a little while...\n \nThen you can come back to pick it up.
This armour is certainly damaged, but I have materials in stock. Won't take long...\n \nI will repair it as if it's my very own.
Excellent work!!
This will take about five hours ...
Repair something else?
Well, let's just see what needs adjusting ...\n \nList of possible repairs:
I see you have tools, Do you perform repairs?
Yes, I can fix almost anything. What do you need? This work doesn't come cheap though. The more damage, the more expensive the repair.\n \nList of possible repairs:
Repair my sidearm:
Repair my primary weapon:
Repair my armour:
I don't have that kind of money... another time perhaps?
I have replaced some precision parts, also greased it, and cleaned it as well ...Use it in good health ...
Marked One ... are you walking around out there with a target painted on you?!? Alright, hand it over ... I Will fix it up for you ... good as new!!!
As good as it gets!! Excellent work!!
Nice work!!
Can you repair something else?
Certainly, show me the cash ... I don't work for free you know ...\n \nList of possible repairs:

List of Compatible Weapons for Repairs:
 
 1. AS "Val" BCC "Vintorez" VSK-94, AK-9
 2. Winchester 1300, W1300 "Chaser", Winchester 1200, Franchi SPAS-12, SPAS-12 "Hunter", SPAS-12 «Storm», Prototype «Protecta», Protecta «Assault», Benelli M4 Scoped, Benelli M4 Super 90, Scattergun Benelli M3, Mossberg 590, Scattergun Remington 870, Remington 870, TDS-194, USAS-12
 3. AEK-971 AK-74 AKS-74 "Archer", AKS-74U AK-101 AK-104 AK-108, RPK-74 PP-19 "Bison", PP-20 "Bison", OTS -14 "Thunderstorm", OTS-14 "Groza" 5.45mm, OC-14 "Groza" 5.56mm, OC-14 Groza "Lynx", OC-14 Groza "Flame», FN FNC Para, VZ-58
 4. Cut with BM-16, TOZ-34, Browning Auto-5
 5. AK-47, AKM, AKM "Ghost", AKS-47, RPD, PKM, SKS, rifle AR-F
 6. AN-94 "Abakan" AN-2012
 7. HK G36, Heckler-Koch MG-36, HK XM8 Para, XM8 Sharpshooter, HK G36 «Aimpoint»
 8. Enfield L85A2, Enfield L86A1, Enfield L86A2 LSW, Steyr AUG A1, Steyr AUG A3, Steyr AUG BMK
 9. LR-300ML, Colt M16A2, M4A1 SOPMOD, M4A1 Modded, M4 Compact, Diemaco C7, Ironsighted SBR, Heckler-Koch 416, Heckler-Koch 417 «Sniper», Knights SR-25, FN FAL C1
 10. SIG SG-550, SIG SG-552 «Commando», SIG SG-552 «Anaconda», FN SCAR-L, FN SCAR-H, Heckler-Koch G3A3, Magpul Masada, SCAR «Crysis»
 11. Saiga-12C, Saiga-12K, Tactical Saiga, Saiga Tactical "Sniper"
 12. HK MP5, HK MP5M, HK MP5K-PDW, HK MP5-SD, HK MP7, IMI UZI, Micro-Uzi, ScorpionVz.61, Steyr TMP, Ingram MAC-10, Heckler-Koch 53A3, Heckler-Koch UMP-45 PP-2000 PP-9 "Wedge"
 13. SVD, SVD-S, PRS "Tiger" IRS "hawk", IED, IED, AC, Arctic Warfare Police, «Iglomet» B-94, VSSK "exhaust" KSVK, Mosin Rifle, Rifle Mosin "Sniper" Cutting Mosin rifle, Zastava M76, M-14, M-14 DMR, M-21, Barrett M82, MSG-90, Sako TRG-42, Sako TRG-41, Arctic Warfare Police, Remington 700, M-21 «Warfare» , Walther WA-2000 «Warfare»
 14. Gauss-Pistol M72-GG, Gauss M72-GR, Gauss M72-G1, Gauss M72-G2, Gauss M72 «Ghost», Anomalous Gauss-SPAS
 15. FN F2000, FN F2000 "Sniper", FN-2000 "The Executioner», FN F2000 «Duo», XM-29 OICW
 16. RG-6, RG-6 "Bulldog», M-79
 17. RPG-7 RPG-7 "Bumblebee" MANPADS "Needle"
 18. Beretta 92FS, Beretta M9A1, Beretta Cleric, Beretta 8000, Beretta PX4, Beretta 93R, Beretta Stars, FN Browning HP-SA, Walther P99, Walther P100, Walther PPK, Glock 17, Glock 18, Glock 19, Heckler-Koch P7, Bernardelli P-018, SIG-Sauer 226, SW MK-22, Intratec TEC DC-9
 19. APS, OC-33 "Pernach" Fort 12 Fort 14, PB, PM, Special PM, PM "Award", Army PM, CT-33, MP-444 "Bagheera"
 20. SIG-Sauer P220, HK USP, Colt M1911, Desert Eagle, Desert Eagle «Magnum», Desert Eagle «Steppe Eagle», Desert Eagle 9x19mm, Desert Eagle Mark XIX, Glock 35, FN Five-Seven
 21. Kriss super V, Kriss Waper PRO
 22. FAMAS Prototype, Tavor TAR 21, FW-900K, QBZ-97, KAC PDW
 23. FN P90, Zastava CZN-M22
 24. Taurus Raging Bull, Colt Anaconda
 25. Maschinengewehr 42, FN Minimi, Minigun M-134SM, Minigun M-134 «Plus», PTRD
 26. SCD-40, PPS-41, Thompson, MR-40, Mauser C96
 27. Homemade pistol
 28. Flamethrower
 29. Crossbow

List of available Upgrades and Restrictive Variants:
 1. After weight reduction, no further upgrades are possible
 
 2. The weapons which can change calibre (only for base models):
 * AK-74, AKS-74 "Cobra", AK-74U, AN-94 "Abakan" - with 5.45x39mm on 5.56x45mm
 * PP-19 "Bizon", Scorpion SA Vz 82 - with 9x18mm on 9x19mm
 * HK MP5A3, HK MP-5K-PDW, HK MP-7a3, IMI UZI - with 9x19mm on 9x18mm
 * FN F2000, HK G36, LR-300ML, SIG SG-550, SIG SG552 «Commando», Enfield L85A2, FAMAS Prototype3, Colt M16A2, M4A1 SOPMOD, Tavor STAR 21, - with 5.56x45mm on 5.45x39mm
 
 3. The weapon to which can lower return and to increase a grouping (only for base models):
 AK-74, AKS-74 "Cobra", AKS-74U, AN-94 "Abakan", AK-47, PP-19 "Bizon", Scorpion Vz.61, HK MP5A3, HK MP-5K-PDW, HK MP-7A3, IMI UZI, FN F2000, HK G36, LR-300ML, SIG SG-550, SIG SG552 «Commando», Enfield L85A2, FAMAS Prototype3, Colt M16A2, M4A1 SOPMOD, Tavor STAR 21, HK 417 «Sniper», Knights SR25 Mk.11
 
 4. Weapons which can be made more lightweight (no further upgrades):
 AK-74, AKS-74 "Cobra", AKS-74U, AN-94 "Abakan", AK-47, PP-19 "Bizon", Scorpion Vz.61, OC-14-4 "Thunder-Storm", AS "Val", BCC "Vintorez", SVD, SVU-A, Mosin Rifle, B-94, "Iglomet", HK MP5A3, HK MP-5K-PDW, HK MP-7A3, IMI UZI, FN F2000, HK G36, LR-300ML, SIG SG-550, SIG SG552 «Commando», Enfield L85A2, FAMAS Prototype3, Colt M16A2, M4A1 SOPMOD, Tavor STAR 21, HK 417 «Sniper», Knights SR25 Mk.11, Saiga-12C, Winchester 1300, Franchi SPAS-12, BM16 (sawn-off), TOXZ-34, M4 SUPER 90, Protekta, PPSH-41, Kriss Super V, FN P90, PKM, M79 Grenade-Launcher
